data.title: This Actor Who Gave 29 Flops Will Fight With Shah Rukh Khan In King, Makers Have Made A Big Plan!
data.text:
The year 2023 was in the name of Shah Rukh Khan. Ruled the box office for the whole year. Started with ‘Pathan’. The film got more than 1000 crore impressions. After this, the film ‘Jawaan’ also created a buzz at the box office. The rest of the work was done by ‘Dinky’. The film has received good response from the public. Well, he won’t have a film release this year. He is currently busy with his next project, which is- King. Suhana Khan is going to make her theater debut with Sujoy Ghosh’s film. Initially it was a Suhana Khan film entirely, but later it was revealed that Shah Rukh Khan will be in the full role. Now there is another big entry in the film.

Suhana Khan has already started training for this film long ago. Recently, Shahrukh and Suhana Khan reached London for the shooting of the film. However, Anant has returned to India for Ambani and Radhika’s wedding. Work on the film will resume soon.

Who will Shah Rukh Khan face in King?

Currently, Shahrukh Khan’s entire focus is on King. This action thriller film is directed by Sujoy Ghosh. Siddharth Anand is producing it. The makers want to cast big actors in the film to make it as big as ‘Pathan’ and ‘Jawaan’. Recently a report was published on Peepingmoon.com. From this it came to know that Abhishek Bachchan has entered the film. In this big action entertainer, he is going to be the villain who will be directly competing with Shah Rukh Khan. However, there is no word yet on what the makers have in mind for her character.

According to media reports, Shahrukh Khan is going to play the role of Don in this film. His daughter Suhana Khan will also be seen in the lead role in this film. Suhana Khan is playing the role of a young woman in the film, for whom many things suddenly change and she finds herself in trouble. Abhishek Bachchan at the beginning of his film career

The report revealed that this is the first time that Abhishek Bachchan has been offered the role of a villain in such a big commercial film. However, he was shocked when he was offered the role. But he immediately agreed to it. This will be a special role. In fact Siddharth Anand plans to present Abhishek in a way that the audience has never seen before.

When will the shooting start?

Shah Rukh Khan and Abhishek Bachchan have previously worked together in ‘Kabhi Alvida Na Kehna’ and ‘Happy New Year’. However, they will be seen opposite each other in a film for the first time. While this is his first project with Siddharth Anand. The film is currently in pre-production and is expected to begin shooting in October-November this year. The makers are planning to release this film in the year 2025.
